Posts.Content: Gingersnappy wrote: My biopsy was done last Thursday. I was not surprised by the diagnosis. I told the doctor that and after being shocked by my saying that she told me she wasn't surprised either. I don't know any details other than that I will be contacted again tomorrow morning to set up an appointment with a breast surgeon. I'm supposed to go on vacation next week and want to believe that is still going to be OK. With you for the long haul.... Ginger Diagnosed 7/27/15 Dx 7/27/2015, IDC, Left, 2cm, Stage IIA, Grade 2, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Chemotherapy 8/27/2015 Taxotere (docetaxel) Targeted Therapy Herceptin (trastuzumab) Targeted Therapy Perjeta (pertuzumab) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Received the phone call tonight... Gingersnappy CAMommy
